name: Vladimir Beliaev
headline: AI Full Stack Engineer | Product Lead | Analytics Engineer
summary: Full Stack Engineer with 4+ years of experience building production-ready web applications, AI-driven systems, and data-driven products. Expert in bridging the gap between business goals and engineering execution. Specialized in integrating LLMs (RAG, Agents) with modern web stacks. Founder of 3 shipped micro-SaaS products. Strong background in ML and Marketing Analytics (HSE University).
philosophy: Ship, ship, ship — delivering value fast while keeping code quality and architecture under control. Thrive in small teams and early-stage products.

experience.position: AI Full Stack Engineer / Product Lead
experience.summary: Architected and deployed full-stack AI solutions and micro-SaaS products. Managed full lifecycle: hypothesis validation, prototyping, and GTM strategy.
achievements: Built Quizbee.academy: AI platform converting PDFs to interactive quizzes using PydanticAI and Redis.
Developed HackSeeker: Market validation tool with LLM-powered data analysis.
Created YouStory.nl: Interactive AI storytelling platform with real-time text generation.
Managed infrastructure on Hetzner with Docker and Coolify (99.9% uptime).
Reduced deployment time by 40% through optimized CI/CD pipelines.
experience.stack: SvelteKit, Astro, FastAPI, Node.js, Postgres, Redis, LangChain, PydanticAI, Docker

experience.summary: Led development of a self-hosted RAG system for enterprise clients, integrated with Bitrix24.
achievements: Implemented vector search strategies (Qdrant, Elastic), significantly improving retrieval accuracy.
Optimized backend performance (FastAPI) for high-load concurrent user scenarios.
Designed document ingestion pipelines with complex validation and role-based access control.
Translated business requirements into technical specs for B2B knowledge base systems.
experience.stack: FastAPI, Elastic, Qdrant, Postgres, Docker, Python

experience.summary: Analyzed operations and built financial/operational models for inventory and supply chain.
achievements: Built demand forecasting and inventory management models.
Automated reporting using SQL and Python, reducing manual work by 60%+
Analyzed supply chain efficiency and proposed data-driven optimizations.
